user.title: Hyundai Bluelink (KR) OAuth setup
user.description: Enter your Hyundai Bluelink (South Korea) OAuth client details. In the API console Settings, set Login redirect URL to {oauth_callback_url} and Data redirect URL to {terms_callback_url}. After confirming, the login page will open in a new window/webview using your Home Assistant external URL as redirect_uri.

vehicle.title: Select vehicle
vehicle.description: After consent, your vehicles were fetched. Choose which vehicle to register.

abort.authorization_pending: Waiting for login to finish. Complete authentication in the new window.

error.external_url_required: Set an External URL in Settings > System > Network.
